data.求人内容:
[機関の説明(募集の背景、機関の詳細、プロジェクトの説明等)]
The Okinawa Institute of Science and Technology Graduate University (OIST) is a model for change in education and research with the best international graduate students, working side by side with world-class faculty in modern well-equipped laboratories.The OIST Engineering Support Section is looking for energetic, team-oriented individuals to support nanofabrication within the institute. The person’s principal duty will be to maintain multiple state-the-art nanofabrication devices and assist OIST researchers in their operation.

[仕事内容(業務内容、担当科目等)]
1. Assist researchers with the use of a broad range of instruments and nanofabrication devices
2. Master the detailed operation of our state-of-the-art research instruments, update our user training manuals, and deliver training to OIST researchers
3. Work with equipment vendors on maintenance and troubleshooting issues
4. Attend trade shows and conferences and compile information on the latest developments in nanofabrication technology

[勤務地住所等]
Onna-son, Okinawa, Japan

[募集人員]
1名

[着任時期]
As early as possible

data.勤務形態: 常勤（任期あり）,Full-time, fixed term appointment for 2 years. Contract initially with 3 month probationary period (inclusive).
data.応募資格: (Required)1. Earned degree in experimental physics, materials science, engineering, or a closely related area2. The candidate must be well trained in at least one of the following areas:(a) Vacuum thin-film preparation and materials characterization(b) Microfabrication with standard lithography, deposition, and etching tools3. The candidate must be able to carry out all daily business in English4. Ability to learn new skills and learn to operate unfamiliar instruments5. Ability to adapt to local culture and rapidly changing work environment(Preferred)1. Ability to communicate in Japanese and English2. Previous experience in a research environment3. Prior experience with any one of the following would be highly beneficial: computer modelling, high voltage systems, RF systems, cryogenics
data.待遇: 勤務時間：Flextime (core time 10:00-15:00) 7.5hrs per day, (Multiplied by prescribed working days per month)給与：In accordance with the OIST Employee Compensation RegulationsAnnual salary: 4.2 million yen-6.5 million yen (Job class: Administrative staff III, A3)待遇：- Relocation, housing and commuting allowances- Annual paid leave and summer holidays- Health insurance (Private School Mutual Aid http://www.shigakukyosai.jp/), welfare pension insurance (kousei-nenkin), worker's accident compensation insurance (roudousha-saigai-hoshou-hoken)
